thread.title: The low cost, low energy house coming to a car park near you

title: The low cost, low energy house coming to a car park near you
text:
The low cost, low energy house coming to a car park near you 2:41pm BST - 02:10 
A house that needs no land could be the answer to a shortage of affordable inner city accommodation according to a British architect specialising in low energy living. Stuart McDill reports.   
A house that needs no land could be the answer to a shortage of affordable inner city accommodation according to a British architect specialising in low energy living. Stuart McDill reports.  //reut.rs/2JzHIln
